author: Staff Reporter
text:
A signature campaign on voting awareness and ensuring cent percent polling was flagged off under the aegis of the district administration on Thursday.

The campaign was flagged off with the administering of pledge to students, anganwadi workers, Red Cross Society members, and government department officials among others.

Took part

Collector C. Kathiravan also took part in the rally and distributed pamphlets to the public. The rally that commenced at the bus stand here, concluded at the district sports stadium.

Speaking at the rally, Mr. Kathiravan said votes are not for sale and sale or purchase of votes will attract punishment of up to one year imprisonment or fine under Section 171B of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Signature campaign
